item.title: Trade and defense on the agenda as President Donald Trump hosts South Korea's Lee Jae Myung
item.description: President Donald Trump is hosting South Korean President Lee Jae Myung at the White House on Monday

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper to buy Peet's Coffee owner in $18 billion deal
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper says it will buy Peet’s Coffee owner JDE Peet’s in an $18 billion (15.7 billion euro) deal

item.title: France summons US ambassador over 'unacceptable' letter about antisemitism
item.description: He wrote to Macron alleging France did not do enough to combat antisemitism.

item.title: Mexican drug lord Ismael 'El Mayo' Zambada to plead guilty to federal charges
item.description: Former Mexican cartel kingpin Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada is expected to plead guilty to federal charges related to his role in the violent drug trade th...

item.title: Tropical Storm Juliette forms in the Pacific Ocean and poses no immediate threat to land, forecasters say
item.description: Tropical Storm Juliette forms in the Pacific Ocean and poses no immediate threat to land, forecasters say
